alert.note: Alert for Goshen; Niobrara (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 21 at 5:27PM MDT until June 21 at 6:15PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Sioux County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... Southeastern Niobrara County in east central Wyoming... Northeastern Goshen County in southeastern Wyoming... * Until 615 PM MDT. * At 526 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles east of Prairie Center, or 25 miles southeast of Lusk, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Harrison and Van Tassell. This replaces the Severe Thunderstorm Warning which was previously in effect for the warned area. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM MDT for the Panhandle of Nebraska...and southeastern and east central Wyoming. Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move immediately to shelter inside a strong building. Stay away from windows. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM MDT for the Panhandle of Nebraska...and southeastern and east central Wyoming.
